Unlock the power of Oracle Database in R with the ROracle driver. This session introduces ROracle: the installation and configuration steps, key features,  performance best practices, and the future roadmap of the driver. We'll conclude with a practical demo showcasing real-world data exploration and AI vector similarity search.


## Speaker 

### Veronica Dumitriu, Principal Product Manager, Oracle

![](images/Veronica_Dumitriu_Oracle.jpg){width=50%}

A dynamic technology expert with a robust background in Oracle Analytics, Business Intelligence, Statistics, and ML. Her experience spans product management, solution and data architecture, design, consulting, development, deployment, and user training.

As the product manager for key open-source language drivers, including Python and R, she enables data scientists and developers to build powerful analytics and ML applications on Oracle Database. Veronica is currently focused on empowering business decision-makers and improving business performance management through seamless integration between modern data tools and Oracle technologies.
